item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description: ### Added - Initial release of WorkTreeBuddy - Menu bar application for managing Git worktrees - List all worktrees with status indicators - Open worktrees in IDE, Terminal, or Git client - Delete worktree functionality - Automatic refresh on file system changes - Preferences window for configuring applications - Support for macOS 15+ - Sparkle integration for automatic updates - "Check for Updates..." menu option - Release automation scripts for building and distributing
